targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}) by (pod)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container!="", image!=""}) by (pod) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container!="", image!=""}) by (pod) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod)

max without(instance,node) (
(
  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$volume"})
  -
  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$volume"})
)
/
topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$volume"})
* 100)
sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$volume"})))

100 * (
  sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace=~"$namespace"})
  /
  sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace=~"$namespace"})
)

(
  (1 - sum without (mode) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter", mode=~"idle|iowait|steal", instance="$node", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])))
/ ignoring(cpu) group_left
  count without (cpu, mode) (node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter", mode="idle", instance="$node", cluster="$cluster"})
)
max by (mountpoint) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance="$node", cluster="$cluster", fstype!="", mountpoint!=""})
max by (mountpoint) (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance="$node", cluster="$cluster", fstype!="", mountpoint!=""})

panels.description: How many percent of requests (both read and write) in 30 days have been answered successfully and fast enough?
panels.title: Availability (30d) > 99.000%

panels.description: How much error budget is left looking at our 0.990% availability guarantees?
panels.title: ErrorBudget (30d) > 99.000%

panels.description: How many percent of read requests (LIST,GET) in 30 days have been answered successfully and fast enough?
panels.title: Read Availability (30d)

panels.description: How many read requests (LIST,GET) per second do the apiservers get by code?
panels.title: Read SLI - Requests

panels.description: How many percent of read requests (LIST,GET) per second are returned with errors (5xx)?

targets.expr: sum by (resource) (code_resource:apiserver_request_total:rate5m{verb="read",code=~"5..", cluster="$cluster"}) / sum by (resource) (code_resource:apiserver_request_total:rate5m{verb="read", cluster="$cluster"})

panels.title: Read SLI - Errors

panels.description: How many percent of write requests (POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE) in 30 days have been answered successfully and fast enough?
panels.title: Write Availability (30d)

panels.description: How many write requests (POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE) per second do the apiservers get by code?
panels.title: Write SLI - Requests

panels.description: How many percent of write requests (POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE) per second are returned with errors (5xx)?

targets.expr: sum by (resource) (code_resource:apiserver_request_total:rate5m{verb="write",code=~"5..", cluster="$cluster"}) / sum by (resource) (code_resource:apiserver_request_total:rate5m{verb="write", cluster="$cluster"})

panels.title: Write SLI - Errors
